text: A Simple Story () is a 1978 French West German romantic drama movie directed by Claude Sautet and starring Romy Schneider, Bruno Cremer, Claude Brasseur, Roger Pigaut, Arlette Bonnard, Jean-Fran√ßois Garreaud. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1980. ==Other websites== * Category:1978 romantic drama movies Category:French romance movies Category:French drama movies Category:German romance movies Category:German drama movies Category:Movies directed by Claude Sautet
